title: 42nd Street
description: A Broadway director's new show is in jeopardy when its star breaks her ankle, but a young chorus girl steps in to save the day.

title: A Day at the Races
description: A veterinarian posing as a doctor, a race horse owner, and a singer team up to save a sanitarium.

title: A Farewell to Arms
description: An American ambulance driver and an English nurse fall in love in Italy during World War I.

title: A Free Soul
description: A brilliant but alcoholic lawyer successfully defends a mobster, but his daughter falls for the gangster.

title: A Night at the Opera
description: A sly business manager and two wacky friends of two opera singers help them achieve success while humiliating their stuffy and snobbish enemies.

title: A Star Is Born
description: A young woman comes to Hollywood with dreams of stardom, but finds her career is mentoring by an aging actor whose own career is in decline.

title: A Tale of Two Cities
description: A British lawyer fondly remembers his past sacrificial love for a young woman, and his current friendship with her and her family.

title: After the Thin Man
description: Nick and Nora Charles are back in San Francisco to spend New Year's Eve, but their vacation is interrupted when a cousin's husband goes missing.

title: Ah, Wilderness!
description: A young man in a small Connecticut town comes of age during the Fourth of July weekend in 1906.

title: Alexander's Ragtime Band
description: The story of a bandleader and his on-again, off-again romance with a singer.

title: Algiers
description: A notorious jewel thief hides out in the Casbah of Algiers, where he falls for a beautiful tourist.

title: Alice Adams
description: A young woman from a lower-middle-class family in a small town tries to climb the social ladder, with embarrassing results.

title: All Quiet on the Western Front
description: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he faces the realities of war.

title: Angels with Dirty Faces
description: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.

title: Animal Crackers
description: A valuable painting is stolen during a party in honor of the famous African explorer Captain Spaulding.

title: Anna Christie
description: A former prostitute reunites with her estranged father and falls in love with a sailor, but her past threatens her chances at happiness.

title: Anna Karenina
description: In 19th-century Russia, the wife of a government official has a tragic affair with a wealthy count.

title: Anthony Adverse
description: The sprawling adventure of an orphan who travels the world in search of fortune and the woman he loves.

title: Babes in Arms
description: The children of vaudeville performers put on a show to prove their worth to their parents.

title: Baby Face
description: A beautiful and ambitious woman uses her sexuality to climb the corporate ladder at a big-city bank.

title: Beau Geste
description: Three brothers join the French Foreign Legion to escape a past family disgrace, only to find themselves under the command of a sadistic sergeant.

title: Becky Sharp
description: In 19th-century England, a socially ambitious woman uses her wit and beauty to climb the social ladder.

title: Berkeley Square
description: A young American man travels to London and finds himself transported back to the 18th century, where he falls in love with a woman from that time.

title: Block-Heads
description: A World War I veteran, unaware that the war has ended, is discovered at his post 20 years later and is reunited with his old friend.

title: Boys Town
description: A priest starts a home for delinquent boys and tries to reform a young gangster.

title: Bride of Frankenstein
description: Dr. Frankenstein is forced to create a new creature, a female, to be a companion to the monster.

title: Bringing Up Baby
description: A straight-laced paleontologist's world is turned upside down by a free-spirited heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

title: Broadway Melody of 1936
description: A gossip columnist tries to sabotage a Broadway show, but the talented cast and crew are determined to make it a success.

title: Camille
description: A Parisian courtesan falls in love with a young man from a good family, but their romance is threatened by her past and his father's disapproval.

title: Captain Blood
description: A doctor is arrested and sold into slavery for treating a wounded rebel. He and his fellow slaves capture a Spanish ship and become pirates.

title: Captains Courageous
description: A spoiled brat who falls overboard from a steamship is rescued by a Portuguese fisherman, who teaches him the ways of the sea.

title: Cavalcade
description: A historical drama portraying the lives of two English families from New Year's Eve 1899 to 1933.

title: Cimarron
description: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.

title: City Lights
description: With the help of a wealthy drunk, a tramp falls in love with a blind flower girl.

title: Cleopatra
description: The story of the Egyptian queen Cleopatra's manipulation of Julius Caesar and Marc Antony in her ill-fated attempt to save the Egyptian empire.

title: Dangerous
description: A washed-up Broadway star is given a second chance by a wealthy architect, but her self-destructive nature threatens her comeback.

title: Dark Victory
description: A young socialite is diagnosed with a fatal brain tumor and must come to terms with her mortality.

title: David Copperfield
description: The story of a young man's journey from a difficult childhood to a successful career as a writer in Victorian England.

title: Dead End
description: The lives of the rich and the poor intersect on a dead-end street in a New York City slum.

title: Design for Living
description: Two American artists in Paris fall in love with the same woman, and the three of them try to live together in a platonic mnage  trois.

title: Destry Rides Again
description: A young, mild-mannered deputy is sent to tame a lawless frontier town, but he finds his non-violent methods are no match for the town's corrupt boss.

title: Dinner at Eight
description: A group of high-society guests invited to a dinner party find their lives intersecting in unexpected ways.

title: Dishonored
description: A Viennese prostitute becomes a spy for Austria during World War I and falls in love with a Russian enemy agent.

title: Dodsworth
description: A retired auto magnate and his wife take a trip to Europe, where they find their differing interests and personalities pull them apart.

title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
description: Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.

title: Dracula
description: The ancient vampire Count Dracula arrives in England and begins to prey on the virtuous young Mina.

title: Duck Soup
description: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.

title: Easy Living
description: A series of comic misunderstandings ensues when a wealthy financier throws his wife's expensive fur coat out the window and it lands on a young working woman.

title: Five Star Final
description: A ruthless newspaper editor revives a sensational old murder case to boost circulation, with tragic consequences.

title: Flash Gordon
description: A polo player and his beautiful companion are whisked away to the planet Mongo, where they must battle the evil Emperor Ming the Merciless.

title: Flowers and Trees
description: A charming animated short in which trees and flowers come to life.

title: Follow the Fleet
description: Two sailors on shore leave in San Francisco get involved with a pair of dancing sisters.

title: Footlight Parade
description: A Broadway producer struggles to stage a series of elaborate musical numbers for the new talking pictures.

title: Four Daughters
description: The lives and romantic entanglements of four musical sisters.

title: Frankenstein
description: An obsessed scientist assembles a living being from parts of exhumed corpses.

title: Freaks
description: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but her deformed friends discover she is only after his inheritance.

title: Fury
description: An innocent man is wrongly accused of a crime and nearly lynched by a mob. He escapes and seeks revenge on his persecutors.

title: G-Men
description: A young lawyer joins the FBI and becomes a key agent in the war against organized crime.

title: Gold Diggers of 1933
description: A group of showgirls in the Great Depression struggle to find work and love.

title: Gone with the Wind
description: A manipulative Southern belle carries on a turbulent affair with a blockade runner during the American Civil War.

title: Goodbye, Mr. Chips
description: An aged, retired schoolmaster looks back on his career and his personal life over the decades.

title: Grand Hotel
description: A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.

title: Grand Illusion
description: During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German POW camp. Several escape attempts follow.

title: Gunga Din
description: In 19th-century India, three British soldiers and a native water bearer fight against a murderous cult.

title: Hell's Angels
description: Two brothers, one a coward and the other a hero, join the Royal Flying Corps during World War I.

title: Holiday
description: A young man from a humble background becomes engaged to a wealthy socialite, but finds himself drawn to her more unconventional sister.

title: Horse Feathers
description: A college president tries to improve his school's football team by hiring two inept professional players.

title: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
description: A World War I veteran is wrongly convicted of a crime and sentenced to a brutal Southern chain gang, from which he escapes.

title: I'm No Angel
description: A circus performer's romantic entanglements with a wealthy man lead to a breach-of-promise lawsuit.

title: Imitation of Life
description: A struggling widow and her black housekeeper build a successful pancake business, but their lives are complicated by their daughters.

title: Intermezzo: A Love Story
description: A famous concert violinist has an affair with his daughter's piano teacher.

title: Island of Lost Souls
description: A mad scientist on a remote island conducts cruel experiments to create human-like animals.

title: It Happened One Night
description: A spoiled heiress running away from her family is helped by a man who is actually a reporter in need of a story.

title: It's a Gift
description: A henpecked grocery store owner buys a California orange grove, sight unseen, and moves his family out west.

title: Jezebel
description: In 1850s New Orleans, a headstrong Southern belle's scandalous behavior costs her the man she loves.

title: Judge Priest
description: In a small Southern town after the Civil War, a kindly judge presides over the lives and legal disputes of its citizens.

title: King Kong
description: A film crew goes to a tropical island for an exotic location shoot and discovers a colossal ape who takes a shine to their female star.

title: L'Age d'Or
description: A surrealist film attacking the conventions of bourgeois society.

title: L'Atalante
description: A newly married couple's blissful life on a canal barge is disrupted by the husband's jealousy and the wife's desire for the glamour of Paris.

title: Lady for a Day
description: A gangster and his girlfriend help a poor apple seller pose as a society lady to impress her daughter's wealthy fianc.

title: Les Misrables
description: In 19th-century France, a paroled convict who has built a new life for himself is relentlessly pursued by a police inspector.

title: Libeled Lady
description: A newspaper editor, his fiance, and an unwilling accomplice team up to discredit a wealthy heiress who is suing the paper for libel.

title: Little Caesar
description: A small-time hood rises through the ranks of the Chicago underworld, but his ambition and ruthlessness lead to his downfall.

title: Little Women
description: The March sisters live in Concord, Massachusetts during and after the American Civil War.

title: Lost Horizon
description: A plane crash delivers a group of people to the secluded land of Shangri-La, but will they ever be able to leave?

title: Love Affair
description: A French playboy and an American singer fall in love aboard a ship and agree to meet in six months at the Empire State Building, but tragedy strikes.

title: Love Me Tonight
description: A Parisian tailor poses as a baron and falls in love with a princess, with complications ensuing.

title: M
description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

title: Magnificent Obsession
description: A reckless playboy's actions inadvertently lead to the death of a renowned surgeon and the blinding of the surgeon's wife, whom he then tries to help anonymously.

title: Make Way for Tomorrow
description: An elderly couple is forced to separate when they lose their house and none of their five children will take both of them in.

title: Manhattan Melodrama
description: Two orphans grow up on opposite sides of the law, one a district attorney and the other a gangster.

title: Marie Antoinette
description: The story of the Austrian princess who became the Queen of France and her tragic fate during the French Revolution.

title: Mata Hari
description: The story of the famous exotic dancer and courtesan who was executed for espionage during World War I.

title: Merrily We Live
description: A wealthy but eccentric family takes in a tramp as their new butler, leading to a series of comedic complications.

title: Min and Bill
description: The gruff but kind-hearted owner of a waterfront hotel tries to protect her adopted daughter from the girl's disreputable mother.

title: Modern Times
description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

title: Monkey Business
description: Four stowaways get mixed up with gangsters while on board a transatlantic liner.

title: Morning Glory
description: An aspiring actress tries to make it in the tough world of the New York stage.

title: Morocco
description: A cabaret singer and a Legionnaire fall in love, but their relationship is complicated by the indefinite nature of his military commitment.

title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
description: A simple, small-town man inherits a massive fortune and is suddenly surrounded by people who want to take advantage of him.

title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
description: A naive man is appointed to the United States Senate, where he discovers corruption and fights to expose it.

title: Murder!
description: A juror in a murder trial, believing the accused to be innocent, reconstructs the crime to find the real killer.

title: Mutiny on the Bounty
description: First mate Fletcher Christian leads a revolt against his sadistic commander, Captain Bligh, in this classic seafaring adventure.

title: My Man Godfrey
description: A socialite hires a 'forgotten man' as the family butler, only to fall in love with him.

title: Naughty Marietta
description: A French princess flees an arranged marriage and finds romance with a captain of the guard in colonial New Orleans.

title: Ninotchka
description: A stern Soviet envoy's allegiance is tested when she is sent to Paris to retrieve some wayward agents and falls for a charming aristocrat.

title: Nothing Sacred
description: A small-town woman who is mistakenly thought to be dying of radium poisoning is exploited by a New York City newspaper.

title: Of Human Bondage
description: A young man with a clubfoot falls in love with a vulgar waitress who is beneath him.

title: Of Mice and Men
description: Two migrant field workers in California during the Great Depression, one a gentle giant and the other his protective friend, dream of owning their own farm.

title: Olympia Part One: Festival of the Nations
description: A documentary of the 1936 Summer Olympics in Berlin.

title: One Hour with You
description: A Parisian doctor's fidelity to his wife is tested when her best friend makes a play for him.

title: One Night of Love
description: An aspiring opera singer finds romance with her demanding vocal coach.

title: One Way Passage
description: On an ocean liner, a condemned murderer and a terminally ill woman fall in love, each unaware of the other's secret.

title: Only Angels Have Wings
description: A group of pilots in a remote South American port risk their lives to fly mail and cargo over the Andes Mountains.

title: Platinum Blonde
description: A working-class reporter marries a wealthy heiress, but their differing social backgrounds create problems.

title: Private Worlds
description: The personal and professional lives of the staff at a mental institution.

title: Pygmalion
description: A phonetics professor makes a bet that he can transform a Cockney flower girl into a lady.

title: Queen Christina
description: The reclusive queen of Sweden's life is changed when she falls in love with a Spanish envoy.

title: Red Dust
description: On a rubber plantation in French Indochina, the plantation owner is torn between a married woman and a prostitute.

title: Red-Headed Woman
description: An ambitious and amoral woman sleeps her way to the top of the social ladder.

title: Room Service
description: A penniless theatrical producer tries to find a backer for his new show while avoiding eviction from his hotel.

title: Rose-Marie
description: An opera singer's search for her fugitive brother brings her to the Canadian wilderness, where she is rescued by a Mountie.

title: Ruggles of Red Gap
description: An English butler, won in a poker game, is brought to the American West, where he struggles to adjust to the new, less-formal culture.

title: Sabotage
description: A woman discovers that her husband, a London cinema owner, is a foreign agent involved in a campaign of terror.

title: San Francisco
description: A saloon owner and a singer find love in San Francisco on the eve of the 1906 earthquake.

title: Scarface
description: An ambitious and ruthless gangster rises to the top of the Chicago underworld.

title: Shanghai Express
description: The passengers on a train traveling through revolutionary China are taken hostage by a warlord.

title: She Done Him Wrong
description: A saloon singer in the 1890s finds herself with a variety of suitors and a newly-arrived mission worker.

title: Show Boat
description: The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their fairytale romance is threatened by his addiction.

title: Skippy
description: The adventures of a young boy from a wealthy family and his friend from the wrong side of the tracks.

title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
description: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners.

title: Son of Frankenstein
description: The son of Dr. Frankenstein returns to his father's castle and revives the monster, but the creature is manipulated by the evil Ygor.

title: Sons of the Desert
description: Two friends lie to their wives and sneak off to a convention, but their elaborate ruse threatens to unravel.

title: Stage Door
description: The lives and dreams of a group of aspiring actresses living together in a boarding house in New York City.

title: Stagecoach
description: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

title: State Fair
description: An Iowa family has a series of romantic and comedic adventures at the state fair.

title: Stella Dallas
description: A working-class woman makes a great sacrifice for her daughter's social advancement.

title: Street Scene
description: The lives of the diverse residents of a New York City tenement building intersect over the course of a hot summer day.

title: Swing Time
description: A gambler and dancer tries to raise the money to marry his fiance but is distracted by a beautiful dance instructor.

title: Tabu: A Story of the South Seas
description: A young pearl diver on a South Seas island is chosen to be a sacred maiden, but he runs away with the woman he loves, defying the tribal taboos.

title: Tarzan the Ape Man
description: A man raised by apes in the African jungle falls in love with a woman from a safari expedition.

title: Test Pilot
description: The professional and personal lives of a daring test pilot.

title: The 39 Steps
description: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage agent. But when the agent is killed and he stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring.

title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
description: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a rebel band.

title: The Affairs of Cellini
description: The romantic and political escapades of the 16th-century Italian artist and adventurer, Benvenuto Cellini.

title: The Amazing Dr. Clitterhouse
description: A doctor, curious about the criminal mind, joins a gang of thieves to study them, but finds himself in over his head.

title: The Awful Truth
description: A married couple who suspect each other of infidelity file for divorce, but find it hard to let go.

title: The Barretts of Wimpole Street
description: The story of the romance between poets Elizabeth Barrett and Robert Browning.

title: The Big House
description: A naive young man is sent to a brutal prison where he is taken under the wing of two hardened convicts.

title: The Black Cat
description: American honeymooners in Hungary are trapped in the home of a Satan-worshipping priest when the bride is taken there for medical help following a road accident.

title: The Blue Angel
description: An esteemed professor's life descends into chaos after he falls in love with a cabaret singer.

title: The Buccaneer
description: The story of the pirate Jean Lafitte and his role in the War of 1812.

title: The Champ
description: A washed-up ex-heavyweight boxer attempts to get back in the ring and make a better life for his adoring young son.

title: The Charge of the Light Brigade
description: A British officer leads a charge against the Russians in the Crimean War, seeking revenge on the man who betrayed his regiment.

title: The Citadel
description: An idealistic young doctor in a Welsh mining town is torn between his desire to help the poor and the lure of a lucrative London practice.

title: The Count of Monte Cristo
description: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friends," escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

title: The Criminal Code
description: A young man is sent to prison for a crime he didn't commit and becomes embroiled in the brutal prison system.

title: The Crowd Roars
description: A champion race car driver tries to protect his younger brother from the dangers of the sport.

title: The Dawn Patrol
description: The commander of a British flying squadron in World War I must deal with the stress of sending his men on dangerous missions.

title: The Devil to Pay!
description: A charming but irresponsible young man returns home to England from a self-imposed exile and finds himself in a complicated romantic situation.

title: The Devil-Doll
description: An escaped convict uses a shrinking formula to get revenge on the men who framed him.

title: The Divorcee
description: A woman whose husband has had an affair decides to have one of her own, which leads to a crisis in their marriage.

title: The Four Feathers
description: A British officer resigns his commission just before his regiment is sent to battle in the Sudan, but he later redeems himself by saving his friends.

title: The Front Page
description: A ruthless newspaper editor tries to keep his ace reporter from leaving the business and getting married.

title: The Garden of Allah
description: A beautiful and mysterious woman travels to the Algerian desert and falls in love with a Trappist monk who has broken his vows.

title: The Gay Divorcee
description: A woman seeking a divorce from her husband finds herself entangled with a charming dancer.

title: The Girl from Missouri
description: A determined young woman from a small town in Missouri comes to New York to marry a rich man.

title: The Good Earth
description: A Chinese farmer and his family struggle to survive through drought, famine, and revolution.

title: The Great Ziegfeld
description: The life and career of the renowned Broadway impresario Florenz Ziegfeld Jr.

title: The Guardsman
description: An actor tests his actress wife's fidelity by disguising himself as a guardsman and attempting to seduce her.

title: The House of Rothschild
description: The story of the rise of the Rothschild banking family in Europe.

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
description: In 15th-century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.

title: The Informer
description: In 1920s Dublin, an IRA man informs on his friend and is ostracized for it.

title: The Invisible Man
description: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

title: The Lady Vanishes
description: While traveling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

title: The Life of Emile Zola
description: The biopic of the famous French writer Emile Zola and his involvement in the Dreyfus Affair.

title: The Little Minister
description: A Scottish minister falls in love with a mysterious gypsy girl, who is more than she seems.

title: The Lives of a Bengal Lancer
description: A veteran British officer in India must deal with his son, a new recruit, and a wily local chieftain.

title: The Lost Patrol
description: A British army patrol in Mesopotamia is lost in the desert and picked off one by one by unseen Arab snipers.

title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
description: A British family on vacation in Switzerland accidentally stumbles upon an assassination plot and their daughter is kidnapped to ensure their silence.

title: The Mask of Fu Manchu
description: A British expedition to find the tomb of Genghis Khan is opposed by the evil Dr. Fu Manchu.

title: The Merry Widow
description: The queen of a small European kingdom must persuade a playboy prince to marry a wealthy widow to save the country from bankruptcy.

title: The Most Dangerous Game
description: A big-game hunter on a remote island decides to hunt the ultimate prey: man.

title: The Mummy
description: A resurrected Egyptian mummy stalks a beautiful woman he believes to be the reincarnation of his long-lost love.

title: The Music Box
description: Two bumbling delivery men have a series of misadventures while trying to deliver a piano.

title: The Old Dark House
description: Seeking shelter from a storm, five travelers are in for a bizarre and terrifying night when they stumble upon the Femm family home.

title: The Petrified Forest
description: A group of people are held hostage in a remote desert cafe by an escaped gangster.

title: The Prisoner of Zenda
description: An Englishman on a Ruritanian holiday must impersonate the king when the rightful monarch is drugged and kidnapped.

title: The Private Life of Henry VIII
description: The story of King Henry VIII and his many wives.

title: The Public Enemy
description: A young man's rise through the ranks of the criminal underworld in Prohibition-era Chicago.

title: The Roaring Twenties
description: Three men attempt to make a living in Prohibition-era America after returning home from fighting together in World War I.

title: The Rules of the Game
description: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as played out by a group of friends upon a weekend hunting party at a country estate.

title: The Scarlet Pimpernel
description: During the French Revolution, a mysterious English nobleman known only as The Scarlet Pimpernel saves French aristocrats from the guillotine.

title: The Sign of the Cross
description: In ancient Rome, a Roman prefect falls in love with a Christian woman and is torn between his love for her and his loyalty to the emperor.

title: The Sin of Madelon Claudet
description: A woman sacrifices everything to provide for her illegitimate son.

title: The Smiling Lieutenant
description: A Viennese lieutenant is entangled in a love triangle with a plain-looking princess and his beautiful, free-spirited girlfriend.

title: The Story of Louis Pasteur
description: The story of the French scientist Louis Pasteur and his groundbreaking discoveries in microbiology.

title: The Testament of Dr. Mabuse
description: A criminal mastermind, confined to an asylum, uses his hypnotic powers to commit crimes from his cell.

title: The Thin Man
description: A former detective and his wealthy, adventurous wife take on a case.

title: The Whole Town's Talking
description: A mild-mannered clerk is mistaken for a notorious gangster, leading to a series of comedic and dangerous situations.

title: The Wizard of Oz
description: A young Kansas girl is whisked away by a tornado to the magical land of Oz, where she embarks on a journey to find the Wizard.

title: The Women
description: A wealthy New York City socialite's life is turned upside down when she discovers her husband is having an affair with a shopgirl.

title: These Three
description: Two female teachers and a doctor are caught in a web of lies and scandal when a malicious student spreads a rumor about them.

title: Things to Come
description: A story of humanity's future, from a devastating world war in 1940 to a utopian society in 2036.

title: Three Comrades
description: Three German soldiers who have survived World War I find their friendship tested when they all fall in love with the same woman.

title: Top Hat
description: An American dancer comes to Britain and falls for a model whom he initially annoyed, but she mistakes him for his goofy producer.

title: Topper
description: A fun-loving couple who die in a car crash return as ghosts to haunt the staid banker who bought their house.

title: Trader Horn
description: An African trader and his companion search for the daughter of a missing missionary and encounter danger and adventure along the way.

title: Triumph of the Will
description: The infamous propaganda film of the 1934 Nazi Party rally in Nuremberg, Germany.

title: Trouble in Paradise
description: A gentleman thief and his lovely partner team up to con a beautiful perfume company owner. Complications arise when the thief and the owner fall in love.

title: Twentieth Century
description: A flamboyant Broadway producer tries to win back his leading lady, now a major Hollywood star, during a cross-country train trip.

title: Vampyr
description: A traveler obsessed with the supernatural visits an old inn and finds himself in a village haunted by a vampire.

title: Viva Villa!
description: The story of the Mexican revolutionary Pancho Villa.

title: Way Out West
description: Two bumbling prospectors try to deliver the deed to a gold mine to the daughter of a dead friend, but are swindled by a saloon owner.

title: White Zombie
description: A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fianc, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.

title: Whoopee!
description: A hypochondriac man goes to a western ranch for his health and gets involved in a series of comic misadventures.

title: Wuthering Heights
description: A servant in the house of Wuthering Heights tells a traveler the story of the stormy romance between Catherine Earnshaw and the gypsy Heathcliff.

title: You Can't Take It with You
description: A man from a family of rich snobs becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but eccentric family.

title: Young Mr. Lincoln
description: A fictionalized account of the early life of the American president as a young lawyer facing his greatest professional and personal challenges.
